pages.title: Storage Controller
pages.text: Provides Lua access to a $(thing)Simple Storage$() network. Query inventories, search items, and transfer between storage boxes and adjacent inventories.$(br2)Peripheral type: $(thing)"storage_controller"$()$(br2)$(bold)Requires:$() Functional Storage mod (fxntstorage). This peripheral attaches to existing Simple Storage Controller blocks.$(br2)$(#4488CC)local sc = peripheral.find("storage_controller")$(br)print(sc.getBoxCount() .. " boxes")$()

pages.title: Connection & Info
pages.text: $(li)$(thing)isConnected()$() → boolean — any boxes connected?$(br)$(li)$(thing)getBoxCount()$() → int — connected boxes$(br)$(li)$(thing)getPosition()$() → {x, y, z}$(br)$(li)$(thing)size()$() → int — slot count in network$(br)$(li)$(thing)getTotalItemCount()$() → int — all items$(br)$(li)$(thing)getTotalCapacity()$() → long — max capacity$(br)$(li)$(thing)getItemCount(itemId)$() → int — count of specific item$(br2)$(#4488CC)local total = sc.getTotalItemCount()$(br)local cap = sc.getTotalCapacity()$(br)print(total .. "/" .. cap)$()

pages.title: Inventory Access
pages.text: $(li)$(thing)list()$() → {slot → {name, count, displayName, maxCount}}$(br)$(li)$(thing)getItemDetail(slot)$() → detailed item info with tags (1-based)$(br)$(li)$(thing)getBoxes()$() → [{position, storedAmount, maxCapacity, upgrades, filter, item}]$(br)$(li)$(thing)getItemSummary()$() → [{name, displayName, count, boxes}]$(br)$(li)$(thing)findItems(query)$() → search by partial name/ID$(br2)$(#4488CC)local results = sc.findItems("iron")$(br)for _, r in ipairs(results) do$(br)  print(r.displayName .. ": " .. r.count)$(br)end$()

pages.title: Item Transfer
pages.text: $(li)$(thing)pushItems(toName, fromSlot, limit?, toSlot?)$() → int — extract items to adjacent inventory$(br)$(li)$(thing)pullItems(fromName, fromSlot, limit?, toSlot?)$() → int — insert from adjacent inventory$(br2)The $(thing)toName$() / $(thing)fromName$() is the peripheral name of an adjacent inventory (e.g., a chest).$(br2)$(#4488CC)-- Push 64 items from slot 1 to a chest$(br)local moved = sc.pushItems($(br)  "minecraft:chest_0", 1, 64)$(br)print("Moved: " .. moved)$()
